se450.elevator

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • se450.elevator.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Thread
    The Elevator Controller will take care all the floor requests and dispatch them to each elevator depending on their running status
    Author:
    Cheng Zhang

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Controller getInstance()
        Get the singleton instance of ElevatorController.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of ElevatorController.

      • getInitialRequestForElevator

        public Request getInitialRequestForElevator(ElevatorImpl ele)
        Search the initial request in the pending list, which has the same direction as the first request, and is closest to the start floor of that direction. So that the elevator will respond all pending requests in the same direction. UP : Closest to 1 floor. DOWN : Closest to max floor.
        Parameters:
        ele - - The specific elevator.
        Returns:
        The initial request for the elevator.

      • handlePendingListForIdleElevator

        public boolean handlePendingListForIdleElevator(ElevatorImpl elevator)
                                         throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
        Distribute pending requests to idle elevator. This function is invoked by the idle elevator itself.
        Parameters:
        elevator - - The elevator to fetch pending request.
        Returns:
        true - The elevator fetched at least one pending request. false - The elevator fetched no pending request.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException

      • chooseElevatorForRequest

        public boolean chooseElevatorForRequest(Request request)
        Choose the best elevator to respond the request with shortest waiting time.
        Parameters:
        request - - The new request needs to be responded.
        Returns:
        true - Found best elevator to respond the request., and add the request to the corresponding elevator. false - No elevator is available.

      • preprocess_pending_list

        public void preprocess_pending_list()
        Pre-process the pending list before dispatching the pending requests to the idle elevators.

      • addFloorRequest

        public void addFloorRequest(int floor,
                            DIRECTION direction)
        The function interface for the out caller to add floor request.
        Parameters:
        floor - - The destination floor.
        direction - - The direction of the request.

      • setStrategy

        public void setStrategy(STRATEGY_TYPE strategy)
        Set the algorithm strategy of the elevator controller.
        Parameters:
